overview: Gideuk and Susie take the road new home on Susie's release from Youth detention center. Apart from Gideuk who is fully hopeful, Susie is rather disturbed by her dad, Gideuk turning up in three years of time during her detention. Gideuk tries to talk to Susie hardly against the akwardness, however, they do not get along with each other somehow.
title: On my way Home
